replies.body: The Legatree has finally been cut down. {{champion:57}}
Chiefs have ended Legacy's killing spree (+400 gold)

The Chiefs are lumberjacks and they're okay,
They sleep all night and play League all day!
I can't even see it D: pls

It's a caching issue that only shows up if you arrive within like a minute of the post going live. You're just too fast :)

You should be able to see it now with a ctrl + F5.
